product_name: Tretorn Jossi Rain Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Puddles and snowdrifts are no match for the women's Tretorn Jossi rain boots. Insulated and weather-resistant, they'll keep you marching forward no matter what lies in your path. 100% waterproof rubber uppers cover feet; water-resistant, gusseted leather shafts extend to mid-calf. Wool lines the footbed of each boot; soft synthetic fabric lines each shaft. OrthoLite(R) insoles and rubber midsoles cushion and support feet. Rubber outsoles provide reliable traction on wet, slippery terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Puddles and snowdrifts are no match for the women's Tretorn Jossi rain boots. Insulated and weather-resistant, they'll keep you marching forward no matter what lies in your path.
